name: INSendMessageIntentHandling
desc: An interface to handle sending messages to one or more designated users.

items.name: func resolveRecipients(for: INSendMessageIntent, with: ([INSendMessageRecipientResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the user’s input when it isn’t clear who the recipients of the message are.

items.name: func resolveOutgoingMessageType(for: INSendMessageIntent, with: (INOutgoingMessageTypeResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Determines what type of message to send.

items.name: func resolveContent(for: INSendMessageIntent, with: (INStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the contents of the message.

items.name: func resolveSpeakableGroupName(for: INSendMessageIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the name of the group receiving the message.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSendMessageIntent, completion: (INSendMessageIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that you can send the message.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSendMessageIntent, completion: (INSendMessageIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Sends the message to the specified recipients.

items.name: func resolveRecipients(for: INSendMessageIntent, with: ([INPersonResolutionResult]) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the recipients of the message.
